title: X-Metaverse
author: X-Metaverse
content: On December 21, 2022, X-Metaverse completed the fifth XMETA token burning under the token destruction program, burning a total of 274,261 XMETA. the total current supply is 876,407,469.22 XMETA. details of the destruction are as followsðŸ”¥X-Metaverse game consumptionXMETA burning quantity: 38,808Transaction hash.https://bscscan.com/tx/0x9539de9d352068c7afd44f3fd4842686a076e012e8e9b63a8fb149ce57cd746bðŸ”¥V2 market fees (energy cores, black boxes)XMETA burning quantity: 13,871Transaction hash.https://bscscan.com/tx/0x91a6e342f49837a7e292e6c7bec2dcc075aa7d5e74c47ea95208bc964139664eðŸ”¥V2 market fee (NFT BOX, Space Battleship, Pilot)XMETA burning quantity: 30,647Transaction hash.https://bscscan.com/tx/0xe3c714f950fd0d8d4e53c4f74dd3938812efe347c2b5533e3b9203374e241bcfðŸ”¥Space Battleship RetrofitXMETA burning quantity: 190,935Transaction hash.https://bscscan.com/tx/0x8ed85d847f255bd79617ee03a245876cc16753bb2de9444b90dfb252c3a8b640ðŸ‘› XMETA total supplyBefore burningTotal supply: 900,000,000 XMETAFirst Burn: 22,051,786 XMETA MediumSecond burn: 385,423.40 XMETA MediumThird burn: 629,717.38 XMETA MediumFourth burn: 251,343 XMETA MediumcFifth burn: 274,261 XMETAAfter burningTotal supply: 876,407,469.22 XMETAAbout X-MetaverseX-Metaverse is a blockchain 3D game that runs on Android, IOS and PC. All game contents and characters are based on Blockchain tokens and NFTs. X-Metaverseâ€™s visuals and gameplay are inspired by Starcraft and Star Wars. Players will be immersed in the vast expanse of space, spending time cultivating different races, Upgrading ships, reaching more galaxies and collecting rare materials. The most exciting part is that you can earn cryptocurrency with other players through actions such as conquest, exploration, competition, mining, production, breeding and combat.Follow us on social media and be the first to get the news!Websiteï¼šhttps://www.x-metaverse.org/Twitterï¼šhttps://twitter.com/XMetaverse_Discordï¼šhttps://discord.gg/x-metaverseMediumï¼šhttps://medium.com/@X-MetaverseYouTubeï¼šhttps://www.youtube.com/c/XMetaverseTelegramï¼šhttps://t.me/XMetaverse_officialTelegram Channelï¼šhttps://t.me/XMetaverse_Channel
